name: JumpingFrog
description:
"Climb the tower and return to man!"

'Jumping Frog' uses only one mouse to play the game.

"Be careful not to fall!"
You may need to start all over again.

Controls

Control is very easy.
Move the camera to the mouse.
Jump with the right mouse click.
Left-click to move to the next floor.
The 'ESC' key allows you to pause the game.
